data.text: @DocJeffD at this point anyone who still cares about protecting themselves should not even have surgical or cloth masks an option which the article still suggests as something worth doing. Would you agree?
@DocJeffD can we clearly articulate what kind of masks and how they should be used to provide protection. we are past anything helps I am hoping
@DocJeffD 🐹 @WaHealthSec @GovInslee @WADeptHealth Can you please direct me to the @CDCgov guidance that suggests we should still be mandating mask for all healthcare settings?
@bldmdmph @DocJeffD Pretty sure this is a shit take by an MD/MPH because it makes several misstatements as facts. What say you: @DrEricDing @CorsIAQ @kprather88
@DocJeffD Lots of risk remains for a lot of things in life. You guys can’t give it up can you?
@StarDigital88 @DocJeffD @DrEricDing Duchin is basically Eric Ding 2.0, so that would be redundant
@cleanslate21 @DocJeffD Possible you shouldn’t have let people tell her that those who didn’t wear masks were bad?  Just an idea.
@DocJeffD Let’s show what percentage are boosted since we know that is critical for protection against severe infection and cases that will overload our healthcare system. #NursesAdvocate
